TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit InsufficientMemoryException extends System.OutOfMemoryException
Public NotInheritable Class InsufficientMemoryException Inherits OutOfMemoryException
public ref class InsufficientMemoryException sealed : OutOfMemoryException

summary.span: 当检测到没有足够的可用内存时引发的异常。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when a check for sufficient available memory fails.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与不同，在开始操作之前引发，并因此并不意味着状态损坏。Unlike , is thrown before starting an operation, and thus does not imply state corruption. 应用程序可以捕获此异常、 限制返回其内存使用量，并避免实际现成的内存情况和其可能会破坏程序状态。An application can catch this exception, throttle back its memory usage, and avoid actual out of memory conditions and their potential for corrupting program state. 引发此异常构造函数时指定分配的内存大于当前可用的内存量。This exception is thrown by the constructor when you specify a projected memory allocation larger than the amount of currently available memory. 你的程序可捕获该异常，并请延迟需要的内存或执行在更小的步骤需要较少的内存中的任务。Your program can catch the exception and either delay the task that needs the memory or execute it in smaller steps that require less memory. 请参阅有关代码示例的类。See the class for a code example. > [!NOTE] > 此异常未包含在[.NET for Windows Store 应用](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=247912)或[可移植类库](~/docs/standard/cross-platform/cross-platform-development-with-the-portable-class-library.md)，但它将引发的某些成员。This exception is not included in the [.NET for Windows Store apps](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=247912) or the [Portable Class Library](~/docs/standard/cross-platform/cross-platform-development-with-the-portable-class-library.md), but it is thrown by some members that are. 若要在这种情况下捕获异常，编写`catch`语句相反。To catch the exception in that case, write a `catch` statement for instead.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 使用由系统提供的用于描述错误的消息初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a system-supplied message that describes the error.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数初始化属性的新实例为系统提供的消息描述错误，例如"可用内存不足以满足这一次操作的预期的要求。This constructor initializes the property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "Insufficient available memory to meet the expected demands of an operation at this time. 请稍后再试。"Please try again later." 此消息将当前系统区域性考虑在内。This message takes into account the current system culture. 下表显示 的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||`null`。`null`.| ||本地化的错误消息字符串。The localized error message string.|

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message) cil managed

param.name: message

span.span: The message that describes the exception.

param.span: 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。

span.span: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.

summary.span: 使用指定的描述错误的消息初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified message that describes the error.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表显示 的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||`null`。`null`.| ||`message` 中指定的错误消息字符串。The error message string specified in `message`.|

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message, class System.Exception innerException) cil managed
Public Sub New (message As String, innerException As Exception)

param.name: message

span.span: The message that describes the exception.

param.span: 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。

span.span: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.

param.name: innerException

span.span: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.

param.span: 如果 innerException 参数不为 ，则当前异常会在处理内部异常的 块中引发。

span.span: If the innerException parameter is not , the current exception is raised in a block that handles the inner exception.

summary.span: 使用指定的错误消息和对作为此异常原因的内部异常的引用来初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因前一个异常而直接引发的异常应在 属性中包含对前一个异常的引用。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the property. 属性返回的值与传递到构造函数中的值相同；或者，如果 `null` 属性没有向构造函数提供内部异常值，则为 。The property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor. 下表显示 的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||`null`。`null`.| ||`message` 中指定的错误消息字符串。The error message string specified in `message`.|
